Hotel Ibis Amsterdam AirportLuxurious hotel in the heart of city center

Tulip Inn Amsterdam is located off the A9 highway, in a quiet area along the banks of the Gaasp River. It offers an on-site bicycle rental and rooms with flat-screen TVs Rooms are decorated with bright colors and large windows. A 10-minute walk from Gaasperplas Metro Station with a direct connection to Amsterdam Central Station.
